name: Astro Pirates
description:
Astro Pirates brings you a space pirate co-op hack-and-slash roguelike flight shooter you can play alone, with your friends, or possibly alone.

The game also features a unique ability and loadout customization system, procedural content, and a distinct sense of impending doom as you face off against increasingly powerful foes.

Join the early access, and help shape the future of the game!
